title: 'TruthBrush' knows when your technique needs a check-up
text:
'TruthBrush' knows when your technique needs a check-up 6:34pm IST - 01:49 
The humble manual toothbrush has been turned into a sensor-packed monitoring tool to help developers design the 'perfect' toothbrush. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The humble manual toothbrush has been turned into a sensor-packed monitoring tool to help developers design the 'perfect' toothbrush. Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2H4HIIW
